price: 17. Asaaku (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) ummaan nafsi addunyal umaanée kee maqaanck abba heemil galtima, asaaku dulmi mayan diggah Yalli cisaabat (fokkooqot) sissikih.
arabic: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡۚ لَا ظُلۡمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: al-yawma tuj'zā kullu nafsin bimā kasabat lā ẓul'ma al-yawma inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
